sentences.sContent: A playful way of saying that one was playing Rugby football was to call it rugger.
sentences.sContent_eng: A playful way of saying that one was playing Rugby football was to call it rugger.
sentences.sCn: 如果想表达某个球员踢英式橄榄球，也可以用比较俏皮的说法称它是rugger（英式橄榄球）。

sentences.sContent: The rugger massager is simple and easy to use, which is suitable for intellectual worker to increase the oxygen supply and keep body healthy.
sentences.sContent_eng: The rugger massager is simple and easy to use, which is suitable for intellectual worker to increase the oxygen supply and keep body healthy.
sentences.sCn: 本发明橄榄球形按摩器简单易用，特别适合脑 力活动者进行活动，以提高脑部供氧，维护身体健康。
